relation: Finish workflows for each use case

textBeforeTable: Tasks Ricky Zhou (ricky) Max Spevack (spevack) Máirín Duffy (mizmo) Jeroen van Meeuwen (kanarip) Ian Weller (ianweller) Clint Savage (herlo) If you would like to join, please add your name below and apply to the Spins Websites group in the Fedora Accounts system. The following people are signed up for tasks related to this project so they are considered members of the project team: Members Project Team Spins Submission Process Spins Special Interest Group (SIG) Wiki Page Related Places on the Wiki 30 June, 2008 - spins.fpo test instance, what is a spin, spins sitemap, development discussion Meeting Minutes What is a spin Content - content for the "What is a Spin?" page Content Screen Mockups - What will screens in the application look like? Wireframe Designs - What kinds of information will be on the screens in the application?
